g.title: Watch introductory videos and read basic guides (1 week)
g.text: Watch introductory videos and read basic guides (1 week)

g.title: Understand the MCP Concept**->Watch introductory videos and read basic guides (1 week)
Review MCP documentation and tutorials (1-2 weeks)
g.text: Review MCP documentation and tutorials (1-2 weeks)

g.title: Learn MCP Terminology and Protocols**->Review MCP documentation and tutorials (1-2 weeks)
Install necessary tools like Xtp, Web Assembly runtime, and Kubernetes (1 week)
g.text: Install necessary tools like Xtp, Web Assembly runtime, and Kubernetes (1 week)

g.title: Set Up Development Environment**->Install necessary tools like Xtp, Web Assembly runtime, and Kubernetes (1 week)
Follow beginner tutorials to create simple MCP automations (2 weeks)
g.text: Follow beginner tutorials to create simple MCP automations (2 weeks)

g.title: Basic MCP Implementation**->Follow beginner tutorials to create simple MCP automations (2 weeks)
Study advanced protocols, language server integration, and Web Assembly details (3 weeks)
g.text: Study advanced protocols, language server integration, and Web Assembly details (3 weeks)

g.title: Deep Dive into MCP Protocol**->Study advanced protocols, language server integration, and Web Assembly details (3 weeks)
Develop automation projects, integrate with Kubernetes, and test MCP functionalities (4 weeks)
g.text: Develop automation projects, integrate with Kubernetes, and test MCP functionalities (4 weeks)

g.title: Build Real-World MCP Projects**->Develop automation projects, integrate with Kubernetes, and test MCP functionalities (4 weeks)
Review Microsoft MCP credentials, practice assessments, and exam requirements (2 weeks)
g.text: Review Microsoft MCP credentials, practice assessments, and exam requirements (2 weeks)

g.title: Explore Microsoft Certifications**->Review Microsoft MCP credentials, practice assessments, and exam requirements (2 weeks)
Follow AI learning paths, customize your journey, and understand automation strategies (4 weeks)
g.text: Follow AI learning paths, customize your journey, and understand automation strategies (4 weeks)

g.title: Learn AI and Automation Roadmaps**->Follow AI learning paths, customize your journey, and understand automation strategies (4 weeks)
Join forums, read latest MCP roadmaps, and stay updated with trends (ongoing)
g.text: Join forums, read latest MCP roadmaps, and stay updated with trends (ongoing)

g.title: Engage with MCP Community**->Join forums, read latest MCP roadmaps, and stay updated with trends (ongoing)
Plan and implement your personalized MCP learning and project roadmap (2 weeks)
g.text: Plan and implement your personalized MCP learning and project roadmap (2 weeks)

g.title: Create Your Own MCP Roadmap**->Plan and implement your personalized MCP learning and project roadmap (2 weeks)
